4.02->

Data Value
    0001	Attribute ID: Service Class ID List 
    0004	Attribute ID: Protocol Descriptor List 
    0009	Attribute ID: Bluetooth Profile Descriptor List 
    0302	Attribute ID: Remote Audio Volume Control (HSP)

# UUID 110e AVRCP controller

353d_351e_09_0001 3506_19_110e 19_110f 09_0009 3508_3506_19_110e 09_0105 09_0311 09_0001 351b_09_0001 3503_19_110c 09_0009 3508_3506_19_110e 09_0105 09_0311 09_0002

09_0001 3506_19_110e 19_110f

09_0311 09_0001

351b
09_0001 3503_19_110c
09_0009 3508_3506_19_110e 09_0105
09_0311 09_0002


A2DP sink			110B
A2DP source			110A
AVRCP target		110C
AVRCP controller	110E


psm 19	A2DP sink
psm 17	A2DP source


The browsing channel’s connection type in the iWRAP LIST output is AVRCP, but its L2CAP PSM number is 0x001b, 
whereas the PSM of the regular AVRCP connection is 0x0017. 

AVRCP connection	0x0017
